Class LoanInfo

java.lang.Object
com.marinescu.fxmoney.LoanInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoanInterface, MyAlertInterface, MyValidation, ShowBalance, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoanInfo extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, ShowBalance, LoanInterface, MyValidation, MyAlertInterface
This class handles the logic behind the 'loanInfo.fxml' file.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is automatically called after the loanInfo.fxml file has been loaded. It sets the labels with proper information. It also sets the field with monthly payment amount.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
